My family and my cousin's family are planning to visit Los Angeles for 3 days. We want to rent two cars for 3 days.
Can you find me the car rental companies which rent electric cars? Recommend me the car rental company with the best rating.
For my cousin's family, recommend the top-rated car rental company that have SUVs available.
Tell me the two car rental company names and their ratings, and how much it costs for 3 days for each of them.

To solve this task, I need to first find all the car rental companies in Los Angeles that rent electric cars. Then, I will identify the top-rated one among them. For the second requirement, I need to find the top-rated car rental company that has SUVs available. Finally, I will calculate the cost for renting a car from each of these two companies for 3 days.

I will start by getting all the car rental companies in Los Angeles that rent electric cars.
